name: Forest of Atonement
description:
This is the forest of atonement.

The dead pay for their sins and
finds life memories again in this place.

The main character bound with 7 shackles.
What kind of life did he live?

Purify the 7 deadly sins and
find the life memories swallowed by death.

Step into the life stories reflecting reality
and the attraction of strategic card game.

* It will begin with story mode finding 35 memories.
* After story ends, challenge mode will open.
